name: Controlled useState
description: Bidirectional temperature converter between Celsius and Fahrenheit with feedback loop prevention and console logging using controlled components with useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage Celsius and Fahrenheit values. Implements bidirectional conversion with feedback loop prevention using isUpdating flag. Provides console logging and graceful input handling.
features: Feedback loop prevention with isUpdating flag
Console logging in required format: 'C→F: X → Y' or 'F→C: X → Y'
Input validation and graceful empty input handling
Bootstrap input groups with unit labels
